courseSectionInformation: May be repeated to a maximum of 12 hours. Prerequisite: MUS 333 or equivalent, and consent of instructor.
description: Study of conducting techniques and problems related to standard orchestral literature. May be repeated to a maximum of 12 hours. Prerequisite: MUS 333 or equivalent, and consent of instructor.
label: Graduate Orchestral Conducting
sectionDeptRestriction: Restricted to students in the Music department.
